main event: An unidentified object was reported hovering over McLoughlin, South Dakota in November 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as dim red to bright red and cone-shaped with a blue color., The object hovered for approximately 30 minutes., The sighting lasted for about 5-6 minutes., The report suggested that the object could possibly be a balloon., Several townspeople observed the object at the same time as law enforcement officers.
